title: newsboard_data
text: vignette offers glimpse inner functions swissexchangedatapackage, built educational purpose learn sharpen skills web-scrapping data online sources, data wrangling package development. extracting Swiss Stock Exchange data Six Group newsboard website, must: Define Date Range, Message Type, Market Products. Open separate view printing saving pdf file swissexchangedata facilitates ease defining desired parameters accessing data directly workspace, making use currently existing function news newsboard_data(). functions added capture access data tabs provided company website. data range capture 2 years data, stored data requires updating time capture data. Looking forward various versions data update time. scrapped data cleaned add nested data.

title: newsboard_data
text: Get data September 2023 --date:
code: library(swissexchangedata) library(rvest) all_items_data_sep_2024 <- newsboard_data(firstDate = '2023-10-01', lastDate = Sys.Date()) #> [1] "Page 0" #> [1] "Page 0 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 1" #> [1] "Page 1 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 2" #> [1] "Page 2 has 4 observations." #> [1] "Page 3" #> [1] "Page 3 has  observations." all_items_data_sep_2024

title: newsboard_data
text: Apparently, newsText column contains tables trades, access require cleaning. cleaning code also used cleaning data package data swissexchangedata::newsboardmarketdata replicated herein.
code: # obtain the preceding text itemlist_newsText_clean <-function(vec){   # obtain the preceding text   read_html(vec) |> html_text() } # obtain the data table itemlist_newsText_table_clean <-function(vec){      # obtain the html tabke from the vector   temp_obj = read_html(vec) |> html_table(fill=TRUE) #|> unlist()   # |>  do.call(rbind, lapply(., as.data.frame))      # if no data, skip, else convert to dataframe   if (!is.null(temp_obj)){     temp_obj = temp_obj |> as.matrix() |>       t() |>       as.data.frame() #|> unlist()   } else {     NA   }   temp_obj } # get copy of data to all_items_data_sep_2024 all_items_data_sep_2024_original <- all_items_data_sep_2024 # extract text and table from newsText through apply newsText_column_index <- grep("newsText", colnames(all_items_data_sep_2024)) # all_items_data_sep_2024$data <- apply(   X = all_items_data_sep_2024[,newsText_column_index,drop=FALSE],   MARGIN = 1, simplify = T,   FUN = itemlist_newsText_clean) # all_items_data_sep_2024$table_data <- apply(   X = all_items_data_sep_2024[,newsText_column_index,drop=FALSE],   MARGIN = 1, simplify = F,   FUN = itemlist_newsText_table_clean)

title: newsboard_data
text: data column trades extracted HTML paragraph.
code:
all_items_data_sep_2024[1:2,1:15] #> messageNo isin valorSymbol title #> 1 208873 CH0344958688 E18 Mistrade Decision in E18 / CH0344958688 #> 2 208872 CH1272334934 KGIHJB Mistrade Decision in KGIHJB / CH1272334934 #> messageType broadcastDateTime security #> 1 Mistrade 2.023101e+13 0.50 EIDG 18-32 #> 2 Mistrade 2.023101e+13 KGIHJB JB P 12/23 #> tradingSegment priority markets products currency #> 1 Bonds - CHF Swiss Confederation Normal XSWX BO CHF #> 2 Structured Products Normal XQMH DE CHF #> newsText #> 1

In accordance with the rules of SIX Swiss Exchange, the following trade in '0.50 EIDG 18-32' has been declared a mistrade and has therefore been cancelled: 

Trade DateTimeCurSizePriceTrade TypeBook Type
11.10.202311:21:55CHF10'00094.0000OnExchangeClob

Please find further information concerning mistrades in Directive 4: Market Control on our website.

Regards,
Exchange Operations, SIX Swiss Exchange

title: Obtains The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News Via The SIX Group Newsboard Website
text: swissexchangedata package, built educational purpose learn sharpen skills web-scrapping data online sources, data wrangling package development processes. swisswxchangedata facilitates ease access Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News Via SIX Group Newsboard Website via function: newsboard_data.

title: Obtains The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News Via The SIX Group Newsboard Website
text: can install development version swissexchangedata like :
code: install.packages("devtools") # if you have not installed "devtools" package devtools::install_github("akhapwoyaco/swissexchangedata")

title: Obtains The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News Via The SIX Group Newsboard Website
text: basic example shows solve common problem: Get data 9th October 2023 --date:
code:
library(swissexchangedata) ## basic example code data_10thOct_2024 <- newsboard_data(firstDate = '2023-10-10', lastDate = Sys.Date()) #> [1] "Page 0" #> [1] "Page 0 has 4 observations." #> [1] "Page 1" #> [1] "Page 1 has observations." head(data_10thOct_2024) #> messageNo isin valorSymbol title #> 1 208873 CH0344958688 E18 Mistrade Decision in E18 / CH0344958688 #> 2 208872 CH1272334934 KGIHJB Mistrade Decision in KGIHJB / CH1272334934 #> 3 208871 CH1240058615 KGIMJB Mistrade Decision in KGIMJB / CH1240058615 #> 4 208870 IE00BDR5H412 GENDES Mistrade Decision in GENDES / IE00BDR5H412 #> messageType broadcastDateTime security #> 1 Mistrade 2.023101e+13 0.50 EIDG 18-32 #> 2 Mistrade 2.023101e+13 KGIHJB JB P 12/23 #> 3 Mistrade 2.023101e+13 KGIMJB JB C 12/23 #> 4 Mistrade 2.023101e+13 UBSETF GLOBAL GENDER hCHF ACC #> tradingSegment priority markets products currency #> 1 Bonds - CHF Swiss Confederation Normal XSWX BO CHF #> 2 Structured Products Normal XQMH DE CHF #> 3 Structured Products Normal XQMH DE CHF #> 4 ETF Normal XSWX FU CHF #> newsText #> 1

In accordance with the rules of SIX Swiss Exchange, the following trade in '0.50 EIDG 18-32' has been declared a mistrade and has therefore been cancelled: 

Trade DateTimeCurSizePriceTrade TypeBook Type
11.10.202311:21:55CHF10'00094.0000OnExchangeClob

Please find further information concerning mistrades in Directive 4: Market Control on our website.

Regards,
Exchange Operations, SIX Swiss Exchange

what: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
title: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
text: Returns Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via SIX Group Newsboard

title: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
code: newsboard_data(   firstDate = Sys.Date() - 365 * 2,   lastDate = Sys.Date(),   messageType = c("Emergency Information", "Mistrade", "Suspension",     "Trading Information"),   Market = c("Six Swiss Exchange", "Structured Products",     "XBTR - Bilateral Trading Plattform"),   Products = c("Bonds", "Derivatives", "Equities", "Exchange Traded Products", "Funds") )

title: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
text: firstDate character string indicating year-month-date date. default equivalent firstDate = Sys.Date() - 365*2, earliest date data available Newsboard. lastDate character string indicating year-month-date date. default equivalent `lastDate = Sys.Date()``, last date range data available, greater current date Newsboard. messageType vector character strings message type. must one combination either strings "Emergency Information", "Mistrade", "Suspension", "Trading Information".default equivalent messageType = ''. Market vector character strings Market type. must one combination either strings "Six Swiss Exchange", "Structured Products","XBTR - Bilateral Trading Plattform". default equivalent Market = ''. Products vector character strings products type. must one combination either strings "Bonds", "Derivatives", "Equities", "Exchange Traded Products", "Funds".default equivalent Products = ''.

title: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
text: Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via SIX Group Newsboard

title: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
text: inputs must character strings, date format %Y-%m-%d (determined .Date()). 'messageType', 'Market', 'Products', supplied, character string options used, leads messageType = '', Market = '' Products = '' defaults. Supplying individual parameter requires use complete string opposed use abbreviations.

title: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
text: Newsboard: Market activity Swiss Stock Exchange. SIX. https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/-swiss-stock-exchange/market-data/news-tools/newsboard.html#/

title: The Swiss Stock Exchange Market Data News via the SIX Group Newsboard — newsboard_data
code:
library(plyr) library(jsonlite) data_final <- newsboard_data(firstDate = '2023-06-24') #> [1] "Page 0" #> [1] "Page 0 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 1" #> [1] "Page 1 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 2" #> [1] "Page 2 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 3" #> [1] "Page 3 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 4" #> [1] "Page 4 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 5" #> [1] "Page 5 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 6" #> [1] "Page 6 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 7" #> [1] "Page 7 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 8" #> [1] "Page 8 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 9" #> [1] "Page 9 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 10" #> [1] "Page 10 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 11" #> [1] "Page 11 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 12" #> [1] "Page 12 has 10 observations." #> [1] "Page 13" #> [1] "Page 13 has 8 observations." #> [1] "Page 14" #> [1] "Page 14 has observations." head(data_final, 1) #> messageNo isin valorSymbol title #> 1 208873 CH0344958688 E18 Mistrade Decision in E18 / CH0344958688 #> messageType broadcastDateTime security tradingSegment #> 1 Mistrade 2.023101e+13 0.50 EIDG 18-32 Bonds - CHF Swiss Confederation #> priority markets products currency #> 1 Normal XSWX BO CHF #> newsText #> 1

In accordance with the rules of SIX Swiss Exchange, the following trade in '0.50 EIDG 18-32' has been declared a mistrade and has therefore been cancelled: 

Trade DateTimeCurSizePriceTrade TypeBook Type
11.10.202311:21:55CHF10'00094.0000OnExchangeClob

Please find further information concerning mistrades in Directive 4: Market Control on our website.

Regards,
Exchange Operations, SIX Swiss Exchange
